name: Fast Chub
description:
You can hide but you cannot run from our fastest bear, Chub. He is an elite wind swordsman with one mission: Clear the forest from eccentric animals. Help him sprint through the forest like a whirlwind. 

--Features--

Endless runner

Easy to pick up and play

Test how far and fast you can run

Please try out this browser version. Reviews are greatly appreciated. Thank you for playing.

Follow us @BlueKumaGames
